comments:
BIRT Build: 2.2.1_8/24/2007

"Total" is not recognized as a javascript expression in a report design.

Table details row is highlighted using the conditional expression 
Total.runningCount()%2=1 

This worked fine on the nightly build on 8/20

This spits the following error:

Caused by: org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: A BIRT exception occurred: Error evaluating Javascript expression. Script engine error: ReferenceError: "Total" is not defined.
 Script source: null, line: 0, text:
Total.runningCount() % 2. See next exception for more information.
Error evaluating Javascript expression. Script engine error: ReferenceError: "Total" is not defined.
 Script source: null, line: 0, text:
Total.runningCount() % 2

----------------------- Error message------------------------------------
